title: Jalapeño and anchovy ketchup
description: This hot and punchy dip goes perfectly with potato wedges, lamb chops or oven-roasted root vegetables.One tablespoon provides 35 kcal, 0.8g protein, 1.5g carbohydrate (of which 1.5g sugars), 3g fat (of which 0.4g saturates), 0.4g fibre and 0.2g salt.
ingredients: 8 slices jalapeño pepper (from a jar), or to taste
